parameters: "The key fits! door must be open now."
"The door is locked. I cannot get out unless i find the key."
"It's way too high to jump out the window. The view is nice though."
"There is a note here. A number is written on it: 7823."
"It's rather dark here as it is. I'd prefer to keep the light on."
"Look! there is a key inside the safe."
"there is a safe in the wall."
"Oh wow, there is a safe in the wall!. Too bad i dont know the combination."
